gov.ca.water.calgui.bus_service.impl

Class ScenarioSvcImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ca.water.calgui.bus_service.impl.ScenarioSvcImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IScenarioSvc

    public final class ScenarioSvcImpl
extends java.lang.Object
implements IScenarioSvc
    This is the class for handling the cls file and saving the data.
    Author:
    Mohan

      • getCLSData

        public void getCLSData(java.lang.String fileName,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> controlStrList,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> dataTableModelStrList,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> regulationoptionsStr,
                       java.util.List<java.lang.String> wsidiStatusStr)
        Description copied from interface: IScenarioSvc
        This will open the cls file and build the following list of strings. 
         controlStrList
 dataTableModelStrList
 regulationoptionsStr
        Specified by:
        getCLSData in interface IScenarioSvc
        Parameters:
        fileName - The cls file name with complete path.
        controlStrList - It will take the empty list. When the method is completed this is filled with the control id string from the cls file.
        dataTableModelStrList - It will take the empty list. When the method is completed this is filled with the data table strings from the cls file.
        regulationoptionsStr - It will take the empty list. When the method is completed this is filled with the regulation options string from the cls file.
        wsidiStatusStr - List to be filled with WSIDISTATUS entries from cls file

      • saveTableLikeTable

        private java.lang.StringBuffer saveTableLikeTable(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                  DataTableModel table)
                                           throws CalLiteGUIException
        This method will save the table like the bellow format. 
         month  NDO          SAC         SJR
         1           0        0        0
         2           0        0        0
   3       0      0        0
   4         0.75         0            0
   5         0.75         0            0.75
   6         0.75         0            0.75
   7         0.75         0.75     0.75
   8         0.75         0.75     0.75
   9         0.75         0.75     0.75
   10        0        0        0
   11      0          0        0
   12        0        0        0
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name.
        table - The data of the table.
        Returns:
        Will return the StringBuilder of the table data.
        Throws:
        CalLiteGUIException - It throws a general exception.

      • saveTableWithColumnNumber

        private java.lang.StringBuffer saveTableWithColumnNumber(java.lang.String tableName,
                                                         DataTableModel table)
                                                  throws CalLiteGUIException
        This method will save the table like the bellow format. 
        
 month  Column Number      value
   1                    1                               10
   2                    1                               54
   3                    1                               98
   4                    1                               45
        Parameters:
        tableName - The table name.
        table - The data of the table.
        Returns:
        Will return the StringBuilder of the table data.
        Throws:
        CalLiteGUIException - It throws a general exception.
